document.full_text: visitors to a new york city bookstore can browse its "new and noteworthy" or "science" sections or even "staff favorites" but all they will find is thousands of copies of a single book.
document.title: new york bookstore stocks only one book
lines_and_colors: visitors to a new york city bookstore can browse its "new and noteworthy" or "science" sections or even "staff favorites" but all they will find is thousands of copies of a single book.
